long_description: Say goodbye to pesky poles with the inflatable Ticla Shado Inflato Shelter. In less than 2 minutes of inflating via included pump gives your campsite or backyard a spacious shelter from rain and sun. Inflates in under 90 seconds and deflates instantly. Movable/removable wall easily hooks and unhooks from any side of the structure. Durable materials stand up to rain and sunshine. The Ticla Shado Inflato Shelter covers an area of 10 x 10 ft. with a peak height of 6 ft. 5 in. Comes with pump, poles, stakes, guy lines and tote bag.
short_description: Say goodbye to pesky poles with the inflatable Ticla Shado Inflato Shelter. In less than 2 minutes of inflating via included pump gives your campsite or backyard a spacious shelter from rain and sun.
